title: Charming Family Home with Modern Comforts in Artistic Nowy Sącz Suburb
description: Step into this delightful family home, offering 4 spacious bedrooms and 3 modern bathrooms. The house boasts a contemporary façade and impressive 185 sqm of thoughtfully designed space, providing comfort and functionality for every daily need. Enjoy year-round warmth with underfloor heating and relax in open-concept living areas kissed by natural light. The landscaped garden and inviting residents' lounge create a welcoming atmosphere, while children have a dedicated playground to play and explore.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the tranquil Suburb neighborhood of Nowy Sącz, this home is part of a growing artistic community embraced by nature and creativity. The area is bike-friendly and offers quick access to the scenic waterfront, perfect for daily walks or peaceful retreats. Life here is quiet and secure, with easy connectivity via nearby highway routes.
lifestyle_benefits: peaceful setting with an artistic vibe
proximity to nature and the waterfront
ideal spaces for hobbies or relaxing read
target_buyer: Perfect for retirees seeking a peaceful retreat amidst nature with easy accessibility, as well as small families who desire safety and a nurturing environment for young children.
market_positioning: This property offers one of the best combinations of modern living and tranquil location in the local market, ideal for buyers prioritizing comfort, security, and community atmosphere near nature while staying within mid-to-premium pricing for Nowy Sącz.
